action.name: Email
action.helpHtml: Sends an email to a given address, with optional attachments.

property.name: From address source
property.helpHtml: Address that the email will be from. Valid email addresses are needed otherwise the email will not be sent.

property.name: From address field
property.helpHtml: Allows you to manually enter an email from address. Multiple addresses can be specified by separating with commas or semi-colons. Valid email addresses are needed otherwise the email will not be sent.

property.name: To address source
property.helpHtml: Address that the email will be to. Valid email addresses are needed otherwise the email will not be sent.

property.name: To address field
property.helpHtml: Allows you to manually enter an email to address. Multiple addresses can be specified by separating with commas or semi-colons. Valid email addresses are needed otherwise the email will not be sent.

property.name: Type
property.helpHtml: Defines whether the email will be sent as plain text or HTML.

property.name: Content
property.helpHtml: Specifies the email subject and body. Data from your app can be referenced inside the body and will be displayed when using ?. If you need a ? before the control reference it can be escaped using \.

property.name: Attachments
property.helpHtml: Upload controls that will have any files added as attachments.

property.name: Success actions
property.helpHtml: Sets what events occur upon a successful email action

property.name: Error actions
property.helpHtml: Sets what events occur upon an unsuccessful email action
